verses.1: Pasian aw, nangma tungah ka lungdam mahmah uh a, nangma tungah ka nuam mahmah uh hi. Nangma liatna thu ka gen uh a, a lamdang na bawlnate ka sut kikkik uh hi.
verses.2: A hun ka seh sa ni ciangin thu a manin ka khen ding hi.
verses.3: Leitung le a tunga teengte khempeuh a kilin ciangin a khuampite a kipsak pa keimah ka hi hi.
verses.4: A kiphasakte tungah, “Kiphasak kei un,” a gilote tungah, “Kihisak kei un.
verses.5: Kihisak kei unla, kiphatsakna tawh kampau kei un,” ka ci hi.
verses.6: Bang hang hiam cih leh vangliatna pen nisuahna lam ahi a, nitumna lam ahi a, gamlak pan ahi zongin a hong pai hi lo hi.
verses.7: Mihing khat a sangsak, mihing khat a niamsak thukhen pa pen Pasian ahi hi.
verses.8: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topaʼ khut sungah leenggahzu a phuan, a kihelkim ngingei hai khat om a, amah in tua sung panin hong bung khia dinga, leitung migilo khempeuh in a tawdat dong takin a liaktum ding uh hi.
verses.9: Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh ka lungdam ngitnget dinga, Jakob Pasianʼ tungah phatna late ka sa ding hi.
verses.10: Migiloteʼ vangliatna khempeuh amah in susia dinga, ahih hangin thuman miteʼ vangliatna khang semsem ding hi.
